translations: 法警；执行官；区镇的地方长官

sentences.sentence: The court bailiff said jurors did not wish to speak to news media until the sentencing.
sentences.translation: 法院法警说，陪审员不想在宣判之前接受新闻媒体采访。

sentences.sentence: If the bailiff thinks that things could turn nasty he will enlist the help of the police.
sentences.translation: 如果司法官认为情况可能会变糟，他会寻求警方帮助。
